attributes.action: request the police to investigate whether Tom Cruise has acted illegally in a recent interview
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tom Cruise has recently stated in an interview that people should kill psychiatrists ("Crush these guys! I've had it! No mercy! None! Go to guns!"), we the undersigned feel that this is an act of incitement to murder and should be investigated by the police to determine if a prosecution could take place.
The interview was for a Church of Scientology event called "Freedom Medal", and has recently been published.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
